%title=手机系统的权限管理

手机与PC软件的第一个区别是，PC软件对权限的管理基本没有，特别是windows系列，unix系列还有root非root用户说法，文件夹有读写权限之分，然而
手机上面对权限的控制非常重要，大体分为三层，操作系统层、java虚拟机层、应用api层

===签名===
每一个应用程序apk文件都要被签名，签名的作用:

All Android applications (.apk files) must be signed with a certificate whose private key is held by their developer.
This certificate identifies the author of the application.
The purpose of certificates in Android is to distinguish application authors.

This allows the system to grant or deny applications access to signature-level permissions and to grant or deny an application's request to be given the same Linux identity as another application.
